text: Bi sond! Ji bona we ra, di wan her du desten, ku ji bona qirine, tene hembere hev, beraten hishildani hene. Destek ji wan di reya Yezdan da qirine dike, desta mayi ji file ne. Ewa desta bawer dikin, eve desta file li ber cavan ducare xwe dibinin. Yezdan ji evine xwe bi arikareya xwe bi hez dike. Dive buyere da ji bona wane xweyi ditine ra hishildan heye (yani ewan bive servahatine bi ponijandin his hil didin)
